homepage.on_number_of_server: Bounsbot, the Discord bot approved by over {{number}} servers

moderation.name: Moderation
moderation.title: Manage Your Server
moderation.description: Enforce the rules on your server has never been easier with Bouns'Bot

example1.title: /infractions Command
example1.description: Keep a complete history of your members' infractions; nothing is overlooked. Bans, kicks, mutes, warns â€“ everything is recorded for your enjoyment.

example2.title: Infraction Private Message
example2.description: For each infraction, a private message is sent to the member to inform them of their infraction and provide details. It will be impossible for them to claim ignorance.

example3.title: Infractions Logs
example3.description: All infractions are recorded in a specific channel, allowing you to track your server's activity.

multimedia.name: Multimedia
multimedia.title: Set the Ambiance for Your Server
multimedia.description: Create a unique atmosphere on your server with Bouns'Bot. You have access to a multitude of commands to liven up your server.

example1.title: /play Command
example1.description: Playing music on your server has never been easier with Bouns'Bot.

example2.title: /radio Command
example2.description: No music to play? No problem. Bouns'Bot offers over 60,000 radios to animate your server.

example3.title: Blindtest
example3.description: Test your music knowledge with the blind test, either randomly or by choosing your playlist.

ticket.name: Ticket
ticket.title: Quality Support
ticket.description: Bounsâ€™bot allows you to create private support channels, called tickets, between your team and people seeking help.

example1.title: Ticketing
example1.description: Create a ticketing system on your server so that your members can easily contact you.

example2.title: Transcript
example2.description: Keep a record of each ticket, ensuring nothing is forgotten. Each ticket is saved in a specific channel with all the necessary information.

example3.title: Open a Ticket
example3.description: Opening a ticket has never been easier with Bouns'Bot. Your members can open a ticket with just one click, fully customizable to fit your server.

logs.name: Logs
logs.title: Surveillance
logs.description: Monitor your server with Bouns'Bot. You have access to a multitude of logs to track your server's activity.

example1.title: Join / Leave
example1.description: Be informed every time a member joins or leaves your server.

example2.title: Voice
example2.description: Every action in a voice channel is recorded, whether it's a join, leave, camera activation, or screen sharing.

example3.title: User
example3.description: Be informed every time a member changes their nickname, role, or profile picture.

game.name: Games
game.title: Have Fun
game.description: Have fun with Bouns'Bot. Engaging your community has never been easier with Bouns'Bot. You have access to over 20 different games to animate your server.

example1.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
example1.description: Challenge your friends to Rock, Paper, Scissors and prove that you're the best. You can even challenge Bouns'Bot.

example2.title: Minesweeper
example2.description: The goal of the game is to locate all the mines in a minefield as quickly as possible. Each clicked square will give you an indication of the number of mines around that square.

example3.title: Who's that Pokemon
example3.description: Will you be able to recognize all the PokÃ©mon? With this game, you can no longer say that you don't know them.

brand.slogan: Create a Discord server that reflects your identity

commands.right_click_on_message_or_user: Right click on a message or user

levels.no_guild_leaderboard: I don't think there's any information for this guild...

404_page.title: WRONG TURN?
404_page.text: You seem lost, stranger. If you want to add Bouns'Bot, the button below might help you.

toast.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
toast.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

dashboard.changeDetected: Changes detected! Please save or cancel.

info.text2: I'm excited to announce that our Dashboard has been completely reinvented to provide you with an even easier and more enjoyable server management experience!
info.text3: No need to worry about managing your server anymore. Our Dashboard is designed to be as straightforward as possible, allowing you to manage your server effortlessly.
info.text4: We've worked hard to make this version the best, and we're thrilled to present it to you without any beta!
info.text5: So, what are you waiting for? Enjoy the best server management experience ever!
info.text6: And if you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to share them with us on our Discord server. We always listen to our users and look forward to hearing from you!

description.reaction: Let the bot react with ğŸ‘‹ / ğŸ’¤ based on the message
description.rename: Let the bot rename members when their usernames are not identifiable by moderation
description.sheesh: Let the bot react with its best "SHEEEESHHHH" if a member says "sheesh"
description.radio: Let your members listen to one of the 41 radios available on the Bot
description.music: Let your members listen to their best music
description.playlist: Let your members create / edit / listen to their playlists
description.game: Several games are available for you to have fun
description.fun: Let your members have fun with fun and playful commands
description.discordChannel: Select the channel where Twitch Chat will be transcribed
description.twitchChannel: Choose the Twitch channel you want to transcribe on Discord
description.phonetic-pun: Let Bouns'bot deliver its best phonetic puns that will make you laugh or cry...
description.bitrate: Bouns'Bot automatically adjusts the bitrate of voice channels based on the number of boosts.
description.achievement: Let Bouns'bot send achievements as private messages to your members.
description.prefix-command: Accept commands with your server's prefix.
description.volume: Choose the default volume for the multimedia section.

category.sendInDm: Send a private message to new members
category.sendInGuild: Send a message when a member joins your server
category.giveRole: Give a role to new members
category.renameOnJoin: Rename members when they join the server

render.readRules: Make sure to read the rules!

description.messages: Ability to moderate different messages on the server
description.vocals: Ability to moderate different voice activities on the server
description.users: See real-time changes made to a user
description.ban_unban: See real-time bans / unbans on the server
description.join_leave: See arrivals & departures of different users
description.guild: See different changes made to the guild
description.roles: See when a role is created / modified or deleted
description.channels: See when a channel is created / modified or deleted
description.invites: Ability to moderate different invites created on the guild
description.emotes_stickers: See different changes made to Emotes and Stickers
description.infractions: See different infractions made on the server

send.sendMessage: Send a message to a Discord channel

nickname.notAuthorizedUpperOtherMember: Do not allow passing above other members

levels.sendOnGuild: Send the message on the guild
levels.channelAllWithout: XP in all channels except this one
levels.roleAllWithout: XP for all roles except this one

status.description: Welcome to the 'Bouns'bot Status' page. Here, you will find information about the different shards and their current state. This will keep you informed in case of any potential issues and let you know if it affects your server.
status.error: An error occurred while fetching the statuses. Please try again later.

moderation.linkSendWhenMemberBan: Link sent when a person is banned from your server
moderation.noAutomatedSanctions: No automated sanction is currently configured.
moderation.sortBySmallest: Sorts infractions from smallest to largest severity
moderation.linkUnbanInformation: This link will be included in the ban embed when using Bouns'bot's /ban or /tempban commands on your server. It will allow banned individuals to submit an unban request, improving the user experience.

infractions.noInfractions: No infractions have been applied on your server, you can use the following commands
infractions.name: Name
